long_description: Brimming with light, soft support, the Cocoon Sleeping Bag Hood pillow offers the ultimate in packable comfort. Inflatable air core is surrounded by soft, synthetic fill for customizable support. Weighing less than 4 oz., this pillow packs down to the size of a baseball in its ripstop nylon stuff sack (included). The Cocoon Sleeping Bag Hood pillow features a cozy microfiber shell on one side and a ripstop nylon shell on the other. Easy-to-use twist valve facilitates rapid inflation and deflation.
short_description: Brimming with light, soft support, the Cocoon Sleeping Bag Hood pillow offers the ultimate in packable comfort.
